description: These savory tofu breakfast bowls are made with spiced pinto beans and scrambled tofu served over a bed of rice and topped with salsa and avocado slices.
name: Tofu Rancheros Bowls
recipeIngredient: 1-14 oz. can pinto beans, (drained and rinsed)
kala namak, (to taste, optional, for eggy flavor or regular table salt, to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Coat the bottom of a large skillet with oil and place over medium heat. When oil is hot, add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 minute more. Add beans and cumin. Flip a few times with a spatula to incorporate and cook just until beans are heated throughout, about 1 minute.
Remove from heat and season with salt and pepper to taste. Transfer to a serving bowl and cover to keep warm while you prepare the tofu.
